EN.GODMODE_DESCRIPTION: Enables god mode, i.e. no incoming damage including environmental damage.
EN.INFINITE_ENERGY_DESCRIPTION:
Removes energy requirement for elemental bursts.
(Energy bubble may appear incomplete but still usable)
EN.NO_CLIP_DESCRIPTION:
Enables No-Clip (fast speed + no collision).
To move, use WASD, Space (go up), and Shift (go down).
EN.SPEED_DESCRIPTION:
No-Clip move speed.
Not recommended setting above 5.0.
EN.ALT_NO_CLIP_DESCRIPTION:
Allows usage of alternate speed when holding down LeftCtrl key.
Useful if you want to temporarily go faster/slower than the No-Clip speed setting.
EN.ALT_SPEED_DESCRIPTION:
Alternate No-Clip move speed.
Not recommended setting above 5.0.
EN.NO_SKILL_COOLDOWN_DESCRIPTION: Remove cooldowns of elemental skills and bursts.
EN.INSTANT_BOW_CHARGE_DESCRIPTION:
Disable cooldown of bow charge.
Known issues with Fischl.
EN.DISABLE_PROTECTION_DESCRIPTION:
Close anitcheat handle.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.DISABLE_LOG_DESCRIPTION:
Disable game telemetry and analytic log from spamming the console.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.DISABLE_SPOOF_ANTICHEAT_DESCRIPTION:
Spoofs/Blocks anticheat reports made by WindSeedClientNotify.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.USE_FILE_SIGNATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Uses 'hardcoded' signature value for file check.
Can be useful, when you put the additional executable files to game directory.
And can't pass the 'Integrity check' on login.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.SHOW_STATUS_WINDOW_DESCRIPTION: Shows a window with statements of enabled functions.
EN.SHOW_RPC_DESCRIPTION:
Shows the Discord RPC.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.INIT_DELAY_DESCRIPTION:
Change delay before showing menu.
May cause lags while opening, so try to change this value in case.
EN.MODILE_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
Using mobile platform touch screen mode.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.STARTUP_ARGS_DESCRIPTION:
Launch the game with command line arguments.
(changes will take effect after relaunch).
EN.LIST_UNITY_COMMAND_TITLE: List of unity command line arguments
EN.FOV_DESCRIPTION: Set a field of view value.
EN.ENABLE_PEEKING_DESCRIPTION: Disables dithering/disolve when camera is close to character.
EN.SHOW_INDICATORS_DESCRIPTION: Show chests and/or waypoints indicators, game mechanics.
EN.UNLOCK_FPS_DESCRIPTION: Allows game to run at framerate higher than 60.
EN.FPS_LOCK_DESCRIPTION:
Limit framerate while the game window isn't focused.
This won't work if the cheat menu is open or if you're in a loading screen.
EN.SKIP_CUTSCENE_DESCRIPTION:
Skips cutscene.
May break some game mechanics.
EN.DUMB_ENEMIES_DESCRIPTION:
Enemies don't attack or use abilities against player.
May not work with some enemies or enemy abilities.
EN.ELEMENTAL_SIGHT_DESCRIPTION:
Elemental sight is kept on even when moving.
To turn off, toggle off and use Elemental Sight again.
